name: Feed The Monster (Svalinn85)
description:
A friendly Alien landed on earth but it's finding it hard to survive in our atmosphere: will you be able to help it survive?

*IMPORTANT NOTES*
1) If you're playing the WebGL version of the game please execute in FULL SCREEN
2) Scroll the page down if you want the downloadeable version of the game.

This game was created for Ludum Dare 46 by:
Xenochu: Art
m_cht: Music and SFXs
Svalinn85: Coding
